name: All CPD Zones Scanner
description: Automatically scans thru all CPD Zones (1 thru 13)

name: CPD Zone 1 - Districts 16 and 17
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers the Far Northwest Side: Edison Park, Norwood Park, Dunning, Jefferson Park, Portage Park, Irving Park, Albany Park, North Park, Forest Glen, O'Hare (excluding airport)

name: CPD Zone 2 - District 19
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers Uptown, south Lincoln Square, North Center, Lakeview (including Boystown), north Lincoln Park.

name: CPD Zone 3 - Districts 12 and 14
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers Pilsen, the Near West Side (incl. Greektown, UIC), West Town, Humboldt Park, Logan Square, Avondale.

name: CPD Zone 4 - Districts 1 and 18
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers downtown Chicago (The Loop), Near South Side (South Loop), Near North Side (River North, Mag Mile), south Lincoln Park

name: CPD Zone 6 - Districts 7 and 8
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers Englewood and West Englewood, Chicago Lawn, West Lawn, Ashburn, Archer Heights, West Elsdon, Garfield Ridge, and Clearing.

name: CPD Zone 7 - Districts 2 and 3
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] 002: Covers Douglas/Bronzeville, Oakland, Grand Boulevard, Kenwood, Washington Park, and Hyde Park; 003: Greater Grand Crossing, Woodlawn, and South Shore.

name: CPD Zone 8 - Districts 4 and 6
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers the far East Side / Southeast Side, South Deering, Hegewisch, South Chicago, Avalon Park, Calumet Heights, Chatham, Burnside, and Auburn Gresham.

name: CPD Zone 9 - Districts 5 and 22
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers Roseland, Pullman, West Pullman, Riverdale, Morgan Park, Beverly, and Washington Heights.

name: CPD Zone 10 - Districts 10 and 11
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers part of the west side of Chicago, including North Lawndale, South Lawndale, the Lower West Side, West Garfield Park, East Garfield Park, and southwest of Humboldt Park.

name: CPD Zone 11 - Districts 20 and 24
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Dist. 20 and 24, serving the far North side of Chicago, including community areas of Rogers Park, West Ridge, and Edgewater

name: CPD Zone 12 - Districts 15 and 25
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers the far west side of Chicago, including Austin, Belmont Cragin, Hermosa, and Montclare.

name: CPD Zone 13 - District 9
description: [DELAYED ENCRYPTED FEED] Covers Armour Square (incl. Chinatown), Bridgeport, McKinley Park, Brighton Park, Back of the Yards/New City, Gage Park.

name: CPD Citywide 1
description: Handles units assigned to K9, SWAT, Marine and Helicopter Unit, Mass Transit Unit, Traffic Enforcement (Lake Shore Drive and Skyway), and other citywide units.

name: CPD Citywide 2
description: Handles evidence technician, crime lab, and body removal requests.

name: CPD Citywide 5
description: Used by mass transit units operating in the subway, as well as as a channel for major/special events.

name: CPD Citywide 6
description: Channel for major/special events - marathon, parades, etc, or SWAT/HBT incidents
